welcome.title: Welcome - Centre Zawaj Maroc
welcome.welcomeSubtitle: Join our community and find your soulmate
welcome.authenticEncountersDesc: Serious encounters in a secure environment
welcome.activeCommunityDesc: Join thousands of members across Morocco
welcome.personalizedSupportDesc: A dedicated service to guide you in your search
welcome.alreadyMember: Already a member? Log in to access your personal space
welcome.everythingInOnePlace: Everything you need in one place
welcome.clientManagementDesc: Efficiently manage all your clients, their profiles, and interactions in one centralized platform.
welcome.staffManagementDesc: Manage managers, matchmakers, and staff members with role-based access and permissions.
welcome.agencyManagementDesc: Organize and manage multiple agencies, their locations, and operations seamlessly.
welcome.viewProfile: View your profile and manage personal information
welcome.servicesSubtitle: Comprehensive matrimonial services tailored to your needs
welcome.matchmakingDesc: An exclusive and confidential service to find the right partner.
welcome.matchmakingDescArabic: A precise choice based on true compatibility, in complete confidentiality and under the supervision of relationship experts.
welcome.coachingDescArabic: Comprehensive psychological and emotional preparation before engagement, to ensure a mature and balanced marriage.
welcome.counselingDesc: To re-establish dialogue and strengthen the harmony of the couple.
welcome.counselingDescArabic: Sessions to strengthen communication and resolve conflicts, with a refined psychological and human approach.
welcome.etiquetteDesc: Refinement is cultivated in gestures and words.
welcome.etiquetteDescArabic: Learn the principles of elegance in appearance and interaction, and how to leave a refined impression from the first meeting.
welcome.legalDesc: A clear legal framework for informed decisions.
welcome.legalDescArabic: Clarification of family laws and procedures in a simplified and confidential manner that protects marital rights.
welcome.weddingPrepDesc: Complete preparation for your big day with our dedicated experts.
welcome.psychoEmotionalDesc: Find inner peace to love better.
welcome.psychoEmotionalDescArabic: Individual support to restore balance and confidence, and overcome past experiences with awareness and serenity.
welcome.postMarriageDesc: Free follow-up for one year to support your union.
welcome.postMarriageDescArabic: Free accompaniment for one full year, under the supervision of social assistants and relationship experts.
welcome.ourProcessSubtitle: Our process works and we have proven it many times over.
welcome.processStep1Desc: Start with a basic profile and upload your best photos. We will improve together based on our conversations.
welcome.processStep2Desc: Get proposals for a potential match with our clients.
welcome.processStep3Desc: we associate you with a matchmaker who suits you best.
welcome.processStep4Desc: Thanks to the use of our exclusive "Romance Database".
welcome.processStep5: Meet your match face to face
welcome.processStep5Desc: Our team will even handle the confirmation call.
welcome.processStep6Desc: We are always looking to improve your experience with CZM.
welcome.activeCommunityFullDesc: Join thousands of members across Morocco in a supportive and respectful community. Share experiences, get advice, and build meaningful connections.
welcome.teamCollaborationDesc: Staff members can collaborate effectively, share insights, and work together to provide the best service to clients.
welcome.howItWorksSubtitle: A simple, secure process to find your perfect match
welcome.step1Desc: Create your account and complete your profile
welcome.step2Desc: Our matchmakers review and suggest compatible matches
welcome.step3Desc: Schedule meetings and get to know your matches
welcome.step4Desc: Find your life partner and start your journey together
welcome.receiveAccessSubtitle: Get started with CZM Platform today
welcome.accountApprovalDesc: After registration, your account will be reviewed by our team. Once approved, you'll receive full access to the platform.
welcome.emailNotificationDesc: You'll receive an email notification once your account is approved and ready to use.
welcome.completeProfileDesc: Complete your profile with photos and information to get the best matches.
welcome.loginSetupSubtitle: Quick and easy access to your account
welcome.alreadyHaveAccountDesc: Log in to access your dashboard and continue your journey
welcome.newToCZMDesc: Create your account and join our community today
welcome.meetPartnerSubtitle: Your journey to finding the perfect match starts here
welcome.meetPartnerDesc: At Centre Zawaj Maroc, we understand that finding the right life partner is one of the most important decisions you'll make. Our platform provides a safe, respectful, and professional environment where you can connect with like-minded individuals who share your values and goals.
welcome.forClientSubtitle: Everything you need as a client on the CZM platform
welcome.profileManagementDesc: Create and manage your profile, upload photos, and keep your information up to date.
welcome.viewProposalsDesc: Browse and review matchmaker proposals tailored to your preferences.
welcome.scheduleAppointmentsDesc: Book and manage appointments with matchmakers and staff members.
welcome.chooseMatchmakerDesc: Select and connect with your preferred matchmaker for personalized service.
welcome.manageSubscriptionDesc: View and manage your subscription, billing, and payment information.
welcome.viewOrdersDesc: Track your orders, bills, and service history in one place.
welcome.forStaffSubtitle: Powerful tools for managers and matchmakers
welcome.manageProspectsDesc: Review, approve, and manage client prospects efficiently.
welcome.clientProfilesDesc: Access detailed client profiles, notes, and evaluation data.
welcome.createProposalsDesc: Create and send match proposals to clients based on compatibility.
welcome.agencyManagementTitleDesc: Manage agency operations, locations, and team members.
welcome.statisticsReportsDesc: View detailed statistics and generate reports on your performance.
welcome.adminToolsDesc: Access administrative tools for managing staff and system settings.
welcome.faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about CZM Platform
welcome.faq1Question: How do I get access to CZM Platform?
welcome.faq1Answer: To get access to the CZM Platform, you need to register for an account. Click on the 'Sign Up' button and fill out the registration form with your details. Once your account is approved by our team, you'll receive access to the platform.
welcome.faq2Question: Can I create my own account?
welcome.faq2Answer: Yes! You can create your own account by clicking the 'Sign Up' button. Fill in your personal information, including your name, email, phone number, gender, country, and city. Make sure to accept the terms and conditions before submitting your registration.
welcome.faq3Question: What can I do inside CZM Platform?
welcome.faq3Answer: Inside the CZM Platform, you can manage your profile, browse potential matches, communicate with matchmakers, schedule appointments, view your proposals, manage your photos, track your subscription, and access various matrimonial services. Staff members can manage clients, prospects, and agency operations.
welcome.faq4Question: Who do I contact for technical issues?
welcome.faq4Answer: For technical issues or support, please contact us at contact@czm.ma or call us at +212 6 98 98 96 97. You can also visit our office at 2MARS Casablanca, Maroc. Our support team is available to assist you with any technical problems you may encounter.

auth.phoneWarning: Please enter a valid phone number so we can contact you easily.
